name: Disk Space Alert
description: This alert indicates that the system has detected low available disk space. Temporary files, logs, and cache data may need to be cleared.
logs: 2025-05-01 09:15: User cleanup performed on temporary files

name: Memory Usage Exceeded
description: The system's memory usage has surpassed safe operational limits. Excessive memory consumption can lead to degraded performance.
logs: 2025-05-01 10:30: Increased usage detected by process ID 12345
2025-05-01 11:00: Memory leak identified in service X

name: Network Latency High
description: This alert indicates unusually high network latency, which could degrade application performance or cause connection timeouts.
logs: 2025-05-01 12:30: Latency reduced by 20% after route update

name: CPU Overload
description: CPU usage is consistently over the threshold, which may lead to system slowdowns or crashes. Immediate action required to prevent damage.

name: Database Connection Failure
description: The system failed to establish a connection to the database, potentially affecting service availability and data retrieval.

name: Authentication Failure
description: Multiple failed login attempts detected. This could indicate a brute force attack or incorrect credentials.

name: Service X Down
description: Critical service X is down and impacting production. Immediate investigation is required to restore functionality.

name: High Disk I/O
description: Disk I/O operations are unusually high, which may cause system performance degradation or slow application response times.
logs: 2025-05-01 19:30: Identified process causing high disk usage

name: Unauthorized Access Attempt
description: An unauthorized user attempted to access restricted resources. Investigate immediately to prevent security breaches.

name: Backup Failed
description: The scheduled backup operation failed. Ensure that the backup system is operational to prevent data loss.
logs: 2025-05-01 22:00: Backup failed due to insufficient storage
